title: The Rogue Trader: Episode 191
description:
We have all seen the films of the glamour - as some may see it - of being a trader along with the huge financial bonuses.

But when things go wrong, losses can accelerate rapidly. This would normally lead to a trader losing their job, but this week on the UK True Crime podcast, I look at what happened in London when a trader tried to disguise their huge losses.
